Entry.JapaneseText: 「時を越え、我らは共に歌う。そこに道は開かれん」 あの旗を掲げた時、昔の人はそう歌ったんだよな？
Entry.EnglishText: So they'd sing "Across time, we join together in chorus, and thus does a path open before us." while raising the flag.
Entry.Notes: "Across time, we join together in chorus, and thus does a path open before us." That's what the people in ancient times would sing when they would raise the flag, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと、みんな、争いのない街を 作りたかったんだろうなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure that the people of old wanted to build a town without conflict...
Entry.Notes: I'm sure that they wanted to build a town without conflict...
